entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 17.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 70 late in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
